head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths REILLY, JOAN F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths REILLY, JOAN F.

block.p: REILLY-Joan F. Of New City, NY, on September 28, 2000. Wife of David. Mother of Elizabeth Reilly, Joan Vetter, David, Timothy, James and Matthew Reilly. Sister of Mary Dillon, Patsy Hoffman and Peggy Stefano. Also survived by 13 grandchildren. Mass of Christian Burial Monday, 11AM, Saint Paul's Church, Congers, NY. Burial at Gethsemane Cemetery, Rockland Lake, NY. Friends may call at Higgins Funeral Home, 321 South Main St, New City, NY, Saturday and Sunday, 2-4 & 7-9.
